text: The Fast and the Furious is a 2001 American-German action movie directed by Rob Cohen, produced by Neal H. Moritz and written by Gary Scott Thompson and David Ayer. It is the first installment in The Fast and the Furious franchise. The movie stars Paul Walker, Vin Diesel, Michelle Rodriguez, Jordana Brewster, Rick Yune, Chad Lindberg, Johnny Strong, and Ted Levine. The movie follows undercover cop Brian O'Conner, who is tasked with stopping a group of unknown hijackers using high-performance racecars to hijack 18-wheelers. It is an international co-production between the United States and Germany. == Cast == * Vin Diesel as Dominic Toretto * Paul Walker as Brian O'Conner * Michelle Rodriguez as Leticia "Letty" Ort√≠z * Jordana Brewster as Mia Toretto * Rick Yune as Johnny Tran * Chad Lindberg as Jesse * Johnny Strong as Leon * Matt Schulze as Vince * Ja Rule as Edwin * Ted Levine as Sergeant Tanner * Thom Barry as Agent Bilkins * Vyto Ruginis as Harry Category:2001 thriller movies Category:2001 action movies Category:American action movies Category:American thriller movies Category:German action movies Category:German thriller movies Category:Fast & Furious movies Category:Movies directed by Rob Cohen Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies adapted into television series Category:Movies about the Los Angeles Police Department Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:Movies set in Mexico
title: The Fast and the Furious (2001 movie)
